name: Spoops Skirmish
description:
Controls:

CTRL + ALT + T : Toggle qwerty/azerty

P1:

ZQSD : Move (azerty mode), use beam when haunting block

WASD : Move (qwerty mode), use beam when haunting block

X : Lift and throw block/item

R : Haunt block

P2:

Arrows : Move (azerty mode), use beam when haunting block

1 : Lift and throw block/item

2 : Haunt block

Green batteries give energy to blocks, red batteries withdraws it.

Bombs explodes when touching blocks.

Game design : Dracau
Programming : El Laggron, Dracau
Sprites, Sound effects : ADM
